page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER-1
page.content: "The area I have to work as a community Police Officer is about 2.25 miles long and 1.5 miles wide,covering both rural and urban areas.My area is covered on foot,I live in the area I work and start and finish at home.My working day starts with a light meal. I have a 45 minutes meal break which I take at my discretion.A normal working day is taken up by visiting local schools,calling at Community Centres to deal with Police problems,covering school crossings,general patrolling of the area to prevent crime occuring, investigating crime which has occured and making enquiries to trace the people responsible.I then arrest or summons then to attend court at a later date,to answer the charge.Most of my work is taken up with minor crime.e.g.theft of pedal cycles,motor vehicles,broken windows,washing lines.
